reviewText: BLACK FOLKS INVENTED TRANSPORTATION. ENOUGH SAID! READ BLACK HISTORY'S ANCIENT BEGINNINGS AND YOU'LL DISCOVER TECHNOLOGICAL, SUPERNATURAL, POWERFUL, AND DYNAMIC STUNNING CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE WORLD ALL OVER!

Can't wait for the day when these elements of American history are incorporated into history classes taught in our public schools! Only in  doing this will we be able to eliminate the ignorance and prejudice in our country that perpetrates the idea that African Americans have not made significant contributions in creating the America we enjoy today. African American History is American History !!!
My husband saw part of this show on TV, but wanted to see the whole thing.  He was delighted when amazon.com sent it to me so quickly.
